casebody.data:
Larry COFFMAN, Appellant, v. Alan BLAKE, Appellee. No. 06-3162. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Submitted: June 25, 2007. Filed: June 28, 2007. Larry Coffman, Farmington, MO, pro se. Dustin James Allison, Attorney General’s Office, St. Louis, MO, for Appellee.

Before SMITH, GRUENDER, and SHEPHERD, Circuit Judges.

[UNPUBLISHED]

PER CURIAM.

Larry Coffman appeals the district court’s1 adverse grant of summary judgment in his 42 U.S.C. § 1983 action. Coffman has provided no basis for reversal, and we find none upon careful review of the record. Accordingly, we affirm. See 8th Cir. R. 47B.

. The Honorable E. Richard Webber, United States District Judge for the Eastern District of Missouri
